```{r}

```
















```{r}
doParallel::registerDoParallel()

log_fit <- log_wf %>% 
  fit(everest_train)


log_pred <- log_fit %>% 
  predict(new_data = everest_test)  

tmp <- factor(ifelse(log_pred == TRUE, TRUE, FALSE)) 
caret::confusionMatrix(tmp, everest_test[["success"]])
```
